WorkItem.ClosedComment: Issue ignored - check http://pear.php.net/bugs/bug.php?id=8072 for an official Pear::Spreadsheet_Writer_Excel bug report on this.
WorkItem.Description:
Excel5 writer crashes when saving 10 000+ rows with a couple of columns. Even - ini_set("memory_limit","1000M"); - isn't enough. Couple of thousends goes fine with much less memory usage.
